vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Also named: gil.a.di (גִּלְעָדִי "Gileadite" H1569)
§ Gilead = "rocky region"
This name is used for:
1) a mountainous region bounded on the west by the Jordan, on the north by Bashan, on the east by the Arabian plateau, and on the south by Moab and Ammon; sometimes called 'Mount Gilead' or the 'land of Gilead' or just 'Gilead'. Divided into north and south Gilead
2) a city (with prefix 'Jabesh')
3) the people of the region
n pr m
4) son of Machir and grandson of Manasseh
5) father of Jephthah
6) a Gadite
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   territorio al otro lado del Jordán; (b)   hijo de Maquir; tribu de Manasés; (c)   padre de Jefté; (d)   hijo de Micael; tribu de Gad; (e)   ciudad al otro lado del Jordán
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
專有名詞 地名
基列 这个字在希伯來文的意思是 "多岩之地"
1) 多山的地區, 西界為約旦, 北界為巴珊, 東界為阿拉伯高原,
南界為摩押和亞捫; 或稱'基列山'或'基列地'或只是'基列'. 分為南北兩區
2) 一座城市(加字首'雅比')
3) 該地區的人
陽性專有名詞
4) 瑪吉之子並為瑪拿西之孫
5) 耶弗他之父
6) 一個迦得人
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
专有名词 地名
基列 这个字在希伯来文的意思是 "多岩之地"
1) 多山的地区, 西界为约旦, 北界为巴珊, 东界为阿拉伯高原,
南界为摩押和亚扪; 或称'基列山'或'基列地'或只是'基列'. 分为南北两区
2) 一座城市(加字首'雅比')
3) 该地区的人
阳性专有名词
4) 玛吉之子并为玛拿西之孙
5) 耶弗他之父
6) 一个迦得人

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.26.29;
son of: Machir (H4353);
brother of: daughter_of_Machir (H4353I), Peresh (H6570), Sheresh (H8329) and Hammolecheth (H4447);
father of: Abiezer (H0044I), Helek (H2507), Asriel (H0844), Shechem (H7928), Shemida (H8061) and Hepher (H2660A)
§ Gilead = "rocky region"
1) a mountainous region bounded on the west by the Jordan, on the north by Bashan, on the east by the Arabian plateau, and on the south by Moab and Ammon; sometimes called 'Mount Gilead' or the 'land of Gilead' or just 'Gilead'. Divided into north and south Gilead
2) a city (with prefix 'Jabesh')
3) the people of the region
n pr m
4) son of Machir and grandson of Manasseh
5) father of Jephthah
6) a Gadite

A man living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.11.1;
father of: Jephthah (H3316H)
§ Gilead = "rocky region"
1) a mountainous region bounded on the west by the Jordan, on the north by Bashan, on the east by the Arabian plateau, and on the south by Moab and Ammon; sometimes called 'Mount Gilead' or the 'land of Gilead' or just 'Gilead'. Divided into north and south Gilead
2) a city (with prefix 'Jabesh')
3) the people of the region
n pr m
4) son of Machir and grandson of Manasseh
5) father of Jephthah
6) a Gadite

A man of the tribe of Gad living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.14;
son of: Michael (H4317I);
father of: Jaroah (H3386)
§ Gilead = "rocky region"
1) a mountainous region bounded on the west by the Jordan, on the north by Bashan, on the east by the Arabian plateau, and on the south by Moab and Ammon; sometimes called 'Mount Gilead' or the 'land of Gilead' or just 'Gilead'. Divided into north and south Gilead
2) a city (with prefix 'Jabesh')
3) the people of the region
n pr m
4) son of Machir and grandson of Manasseh
5) father of Jephthah
6) a Gadite

§ Gilead = "rocky region"
This name is used for:
1) a mountainous region bounded on the west by the Jordan, on the north by Bashan, on the east by the Arabian plateau, and on the south by Moab and Ammon; sometimes called 'Mount Gilead' or the 'land of Gilead' or just 'Gilead'. Divided into north and south Gilead
2) a city (with prefix 'Jabesh')
3) the people of the region
n pr m
4) son of Machir and grandson of Manasseh
5) father of Jephthah
6) a Gadite
